mapper.select: select mc.Seq ,mc.ClassName as className ,mc.StudentCnt as studentCount ,mc.TeacherCode as mainTeacherCode ,a.Name as mainTeacherName ,mc.SubTeacherCode as subTeacherCode ,b.Name as subTeacherName ,mc.Curri as curri ,mc.Grade as grade ,cbc.CodeName as gradeName from MEM_Class mc left outer join Mem_Teacher a on mc.TeacherCode = a.TeacherCode and a.Status = 'S' left outer join Mem_Teacher b on mc.SubTeacherCode = b.TeacherCode and b.Status = 'S' left outer join COM_BaseCode cbc on CONCAT(mc.Curri,mc.Grade) = cbc.Code1 and cbc.GubunSeq = 4 where 1=1 and mc.HakwonCode = #{hakwonCode}

select TeacherCode AS teacherCode ,Name AS teacherName from Mem_Teacher mc where 1=1 and mc.HakwonCode = #{hakwonCode} and mc.Status = 'S'
and mc.Name like CONCAT('%', #{teacherName}, '%')
select Seq as seq ,ClassName as className from MEM_Class where 1=1 and HakwonCode = #{hakwonCode}
select ms.StudentCode as studentCode ,ms.Name as studentName from MEM_Class_StudentList mcsl inner join MEM_Student ms on mcsl.StudentCode = ms.StudentCode where 1=1 and mcsl.ClassSeq = #{seq}
